common.description: A Home Assistant card to emulate the Sunsynk power flow that's shown on the Inverter screen

battery.energy: Please include the battery energy attribute and value in Wh e.g. 5.32 Battery energy: 5320
battery.shutdown_soc: Please include the battery shutdown_soc attribute and value e.g shutdown_soc: 20
battery.full_capacity: Full capacity needs to be between 80 and 100
battery.show_daily: Please include the day_battery_charge_70 and day_battery_discharge_71 attributes and entity IDs

solar.mppts: Please include the solar mppts attribute and value; 1,2,3 or 4 e.g. mppts: 2
solar.show_daily: Please include the day_pv_energy_108 attribute and entity ID

grid.show_daily: Please include the day_grid_import_76 and day_grid_export_77 attributes and entity IDs

errors.essential_power: The essential_power attribute is set to none. Please include the inverter_power_175 attribute and entity ID in order for the card to calculate this value.
errors.nonessential_power: The nonessential_power attribute is set to none. Please include the grid_power_169 attribute and entity ID in order for the card to calculate this value.
errors.missing_entity: `Please include the attribute and entity ID
